title: Brian Williams' Cringeworthy Retirement Speech
itunes:title: Brian Williams' Cringeworthy Retirement Speech
description:
MSNBC anchor and noted stolen valor aficionado Brian Williams is leaving his show, 11th Hour, and his farewell announcement was equal parts self-aggrandizing, terrifying and elite-fluffing. Jimmy and comedian Kurt Metzger discuss the story.

Plus a segment on the corporate capture of purported leftists on "BreadTube" with The Grayzone's Max Bluementhal.

Also featuring Stef Zamorano and Mike MacRae! Phone calls from Joe Biden and Al Pacino!
